title: FusionXNet: Enhancing EEG-based seizure prediction with integrated convolutional and transformer architectures

abstract: Objective. Effective seizure prediction can reduce patient burden, improve clinical treatment accuracy, and lower healthcare costs. However, existing deep learning- based seizure prediction methods primarily rely on single models, which have …
